name: Destiny's Calling
description: The temporal anomalies have reignited the Vezda threat, putting Starfleet on high alert. However, the greatest challenge may come from within, as the Vulcan High Command is opposed to the extreme tactics proposed for handling the Vezda.
rules:
-- In a Voyage Event, you will engage in Voyages with ocassional Voyage Encounters that will test proficiencies of your voyage crew.
-- In this event, Gold and Silver skills for Voyages will be SEC and CMD. 
-- Voyage Encounters take place at the following points in time: 1 minute, 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 45 minutes, 1 hour, 1.5 hours, 2 hours, and every 2 hours after that.
-- Passing a Voyage Encounter without losing any contests raises the multiplier for Victory Points gained in contests. Losing a contest resets this multiplier.
-- Three of the following traits are randomly chosen for each Encounter: Inspiring, Explorer, Scoundrel, Casual, Playful, Hero, Marksman, Investigator. Using crew with matching traits increases their Crit Chance in contests.
-- Using Vezda, any version of Batel, Gamble, Pike, Cosmic, or SNW crew will provide a bonus to antimatter and a permanent multiplier to passively gained Victory Points.
-- Using the Asaasllich, the U.S.S. Farragut, the Galaxy Class Ship, or ships with the Explorer trait will provide a bonus to antimatter.
-- Earn Event Victory Points passively by running a voyage, and actively by winning contests during Voyage Encounters. The amount you earn increases with every Voyage Encounter passed. 
-- Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Explorer (Ship trait), Vezda, Batel, Gamble, Pike, Cosmic, SNW

featured_crew.name: La'an
featured_crew.flavor: In the holodeck, La’an didn't deny herself the opportunity to play the role of her favorite character, Detective Amelia Moon.

action.name: Hollywood, California. Mansions, Movie Stars, And Murder.

featured_crew.name: Gamble
featured_crew.flavor: An eager fledgeling nurse with a promising career ahead, nothing less than one of the greatest evils in the galaxy could stop him.

action.name: Now It's My Time To Shine

featured_crew.name: Pike
featured_crew.flavor: Pike goes undercover on Kiley 279 to avert a nuclear conflict that should never have been made possible in the first place.

rewards.flavor: Pike goes undercover on Kiley 279 to avert a nuclear conflict that should never have been made possible in the first place.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: La'an
rewards.flavor: In the holodeck, La’an didn't deny herself the opportunity to play the role of her favorite character, Detective Amelia Moon.
